price: 22. Soo kulmiya kuwii dulmi falka ahaa iyo shurakadoodii4 iyo waxay caabudi jireen.
arabic: ۞ ٱحۡشُرُواْ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ وَأَزۡوَٰجَهُمۡ وَمَا كَانُواْ يَعۡبُدُونَ
footnotes: 4. Tafsiir kale waa xaasaskooda ama kuwa aan xaqa raacin ee la midka ah.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: uḥ'shurū alladhīna ẓalamū wa-azwājahum wamā kānū yaʿbudūna
